column1: I look forward to work with the BCI
I think I can deal with the difficulties of the BCI
I do not think I will do well
I feel pressured to do well
BCI is a big challenge for me
I am very curious how I will perform
I dread that I can embaress myself
I am fully determined to give it my best
I don't need a reward for participating
It's embaressing for me to fail
I think everyone can control their brain activity
I think I won't be able to accomplish the BCI task today
When I do well, I will be proud of my achievement
